value:
I left a young girl behind... Misha is
her name. I hope she remains safe.

An amateur like Erinys made one of
the Four Heavenly Knights? Absurd.

Queen Lahna invited crisis to Silesse.
The late king's brother, Lord Myos,
must lead us now!

You come from another world, and
yet here you lead a powerful army.
Outstanding, $Nu.

These bracelets represent my hopes.
One, for Silesse, that it will thrive, and
two, for Misha, that her life is happy.

I've come bearing a wish for a
friendship never cut too short,
from $Nf.

I am Díthorba, of the Four Heavenly
Knights of Silesse. The skies are ours!
All those under us will kneel!

Shame you had to die, but you may
count yourself unfortunate having
met me on the field of battle.

You embarrass me... I will not
forgive this!

With this, neither Annand nor Pamela
will be able to stand against me. I will
lead the Heavenly Knights!

I am Díthorba, of the Four Heavenly
Knights of Silesse, servant to Lord
Myos. Where am I? And who are you?

Ah. My liege Summoner... Or rather,
er, $Nu.$k$pLife with my weapon in hand is all
I know, and I had no place I belonged.
I appreciate you taking me in.$k$pI must not die yet—for the child I left
behind... I cannot allow her to suffer
a life like the one I've led...$k$pHeh... Does that not sound like me?
I suppose not. I am Díthorba of the
Four Heavenly Knights, after all.$k$pFor now I will rest my wings at your
side, if only for a fleeting moment.
Peace here and now will have to do.
てやっ
I have you!
きゃあっ
Why you...!
Misfortune frowns on you.
Your head will be my trophy!
Don't be absurd!
Time to die!
What...have I done...?
Hahaha...
I am Díthorba, one of the Four Heavenly Knights of Silesse.
You will take your hand off me if you care to keep it.
That crybaby, Erinys, is no match for me.
Annand is the captain of the Four Heavenly Knights of Silesse. For now.
Queen Lahna's time is over. Lord Myos must rule us.
I will have the last laugh...eventually.
I do not take betrayal lightly. Don't give me a reason to kill you.
Big talk.
Really?
I suppose...
